ConfigSetCancelRelationFromAddress.summary: Disassociates a sender address from a configuration set.

ConfigSetCreate.title: ConfigSetCreate
ConfigSetCreate.summary: Creates a configuration set. You can create up to 100 configuration sets.

ConfigSetDetail.title: ConfigSetDetail
ConfigSetDetail.summary: Retrieves the details of a configuration set.

ConfigSetRelationFromAddress.title: ConfigSetRelationFromAddress
ConfigSetRelationFromAddress.summary: Associates a configuration set with a sender address.

DedicatedIpAutoRenewal.summary: Sets auto-renewal for a dedicated IP address.

DedicatedIpChangeWarmupType.title: Update Purchased IP Warmup Method
DedicatedIpChangeWarmupType.summary: Updates the prefetch method for a dedicated IP address.

DedicatedIpList.title: List Purchased IP Addresses
DedicatedIpList.summary: Queries the IP addresses that you have purchased.

DedicatedIpNonePoolList.title: List IPs Not Added to IP Pool
DedicatedIpNonePoolList.summary: Lists the IP addresses that are not assigned to any IP pool. This operation is used for IP pool configuration.

DedicatedIpPoolList.title: List IP Pools
DedicatedIpPoolList.summary: Queries a list of dedicated IP pools.

DeleteInvalidAddress.title: Delete Invalid Address
DeleteInvalidAddress.summary: Remove invalid addresses from the invalid address database

DeleteValidateFile.title: DeleteValidateFile
DeleteValidateFile.summary: Deletes the verification file after the verification process is complete.

DescTemplate.title: DescTemplate
DescTemplate.summary: Views the information about a template.

GetIpProtection.title: Check if IP Protection is Enabled

GetTrackListByMailFromAndTagName.summary: Retrieves email tracking data that meets specified conditions.

GetValidateFile.title: GetValidateFile
GetValidateFile.summary: Retrieves the results file of a batch validation task.

GetValidateFileStatus.title: GetValidateFileStatus
GetValidateFileStatus.summary: Retrieves the status of a validation file.

ListUserSuppression.title: List Personal and System Invalid Addresses

ListValidateFile.title: ListValidateFile
ListValidateFile.summary: Retrieves a list of uploaded validation files.

ModifyMailAddress.title: Set SMTP Password and Reply Address for Sending Address

QueryMailAddressByParam.summary: Queries a list of sender addresses.

QueryReceiverByParam.title: Query Recipient List
QueryReceiverByParam.summary: Query the details of the recipient list

QueryReceiverDetail.title: Query Details of a Specific Recipient List
QueryReceiverDetail.summary: Retrieve detailed information about a recipient list

QueryTaskByParam.title: Query Job
QueryTaskByParam.summary: Queries tasks based on specified parameters.

QueryTemplateByParam.title: QueryTemplateByParam
QueryTemplateByParam.summary: Performs a paged query to retrieve a list of templates.

RemoveUserSuppression.title: Remove Invalid Addresses for Individuals and Systems
RemoveUserSuppression.summary: Deletes system-identified and manually added addresses from the user-level suppression list.

SendValidateFile.summary: You can upload the list of addresses to be verified.

SenderStatisticsByTagNameAndBatchID.summary: Queries statistics about sent emails that meet specified conditions.

UnblockSending.title: Lift Sending Restrictions

UpdateIpProtection.title: Enable or Disable IP Protection Function
